As usual my photos are not uploading. Please email me at [url]ethancollins45@gmail.com[/url] and I can share photos. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks.

[quote name="PolarBearPete" post=2172090]As usual my photos are not uploading. Please email me at [url]ethancollins45@gmail.com[/url] and I can share photos. Sorry for the inconvenience. Thanks.[/QUOTE]


Ethan - See if this helps.

Posting Images to Net54 Boards:

Scanned image will need to be converted to .jpg – I use an old Google product called Picassa for that (there are others also)

I use a Free Flickr (flickr.com) account for creating online albums and then uploading scanned .jpg images to the cloud.

Once you have uploaded an image to Flickr you will need to :

Select the image in your Flickr Album.

Scroll Down to “Viewing Privacy” options and change from PRIVATE to PUBLIC.

Then scroll back up and click on “Share Photo” which will give you several options for sharing.

I typically use “BBCODE” and copy that link over to my Net 54 post and Submit.

Your Image(s) will now appear in your post.

There are several other ways (including upload to Net54) but this has always worked for me.

Very helpful. I saved this and will use in the future. Thank you.

Message to all: Bender has SOLD
